text: Fighting Spirit Unleashed is a series of professional wrestling events produced annually in September by New Japan Pro-Wrestling (NJPW), a Japanese professional wrestling promotion, in the United States. NJPW first produced the event in 2018 and has since produced four editions, with the 2019 having been held as a three-event tour in Lowell, Massachusetts, New York City, New York and Philadelphia, Pennsylvania from September 27 to 29, 2019 and the most recent being held in closed doors due to the COVID-19 pandemic from September 4 to September 11, 2020. ==Events== {| class="wikitable sortable" align="center" !|# !|Event !|Date !|City !|Venue !|Attendance !|Main event !|Ref(s) |- | | | | | | |align="left"|Golden☆Lovers (Kenny Omega and Kota Ibushi) versus Chaos (Kazuchika Okada and Tomohiro Ishii) | |- | |rowspan="3"| | | | | |align="left"|Kazuchika Okada, Kota Ibushi and Hiroshi Tanahashi versus Los Ingobernables de Japon (Sanada, Evil and Tetsuya Naito) | |- | | | | | |align="left"|Kazuchika Okada and Kota Ibushi versus Los Ingobernables de Japon (Sanada and Evil) | |- | | | | | |align="left"|Hiroshi Tanahashi, Chaos (Hirooki Goto, Tomohiro Ishii and Yoshi-Hashi) and The Rock 'n' Roll Express (Ricky Morton and Robert Gibson) versus Bullet Club (Jay White, Kenta, Tama Tonga, Tanga Loa, Chase Owens and Gedo) in a twelve-man tag team elimination match | |- | |rowspan="2"| | |rowspan="2"| |rowspan="2"| |rowspan="2"|0 |align="left"|Flip Gordon versus Jay White |rowspan="2"| |- | | |align="left"|Kenta versus Jeff Cobb for the IWGP United States Heavyweight Championship challenge rights certificate |} ==Notes== ==References== ==External links== *The official New Japan Pro-Wrestling English website Category:New Japan Pro-Wrestling shows Category:Recurring events established in 2018
title: Fighting Spirit Unleashed
